nodes.text: The Rawani Cup was a podracing tournament. The final race of the event was held in the city of Baroonda, where it was broadcast by the alien Bakk and Zico for the radio station BSO 401.72. The broadcast played in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu during the war between the First Order and the Resistance.
The Rawani Cup was created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019.
